# R Markdown

## Setup

Install packages

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages(c('rmarkdown', 'bookdown', 'knitr')
```

and use [`tinytex`](https://yihui.org/tinytex/)


```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages('tinytex')
tinytex::install_tinytex()
```
